RejectingReviewers.name: Reviewer 2
RejectingReviewers.description: An academic legend who's never met a paper he liked. His feedback always begins with \textbf{`I enjoyed reading this, however,'} followed by countless critiques. If you are lucky, you get a \textbf{`Weak Reject'}. Rumor has it, if your rejection didn't make you cry, you didn't get Reviewer 2.
RejectingReviewers.image_prompt: Realistic portrayal of a mysterious figure, half hidden in shadows, meticulously reviewing a paper with a red pen. Behind him is a wall plastered with rejected paper notifications, and a mug that reads, 'I'd approve, but...'.

RejectingReviewers.name: Doktor Schon Gehört
RejectingReviewers.description: Doktor Schon Gehört always has a nostalgic air about him, endlessly droning on about old academic papers nobody else recalls. Like a broken record, he can't resist pointing out, \textbf{`Schon gehört!'}, as if the world of research began and ended with him.
RejectingReviewers.image_prompt: Realistic portrayal of a well-aged German academic, seated in a grand office surrounded by towering bookshelves brimming with old manuscripts and journals. He holds a contemporary research paper, juxtaposed with an old thesis from his collection, highlighting a similarity between them.

RejectingReviewers.name: Herr Überflieger
RejectingReviewers.description: Herr Überflieger has quite the reputation. He's known for this \textbf{`bird's-eye view'}, often saying, `I've read enough to judge.' Sadly, `enough' is rarely more than the title.
RejectingReviewers.image_prompt: Realistic portrayal of an elderly busy pilot, sitting in a vintage aircraft with glasses perched on his nose, glancing over the top of a paper, already preparing his rejection stamp.

RejectingReviewers.name: Dr. Curry Critique
RejectingReviewers.description: Dr. Curry Critique likens papers to spice blends. Always hunting for academic \textbf{`zing'}, he always comments, \textbf{`Needs more masala, doesn't it?'} when dismissing a paper.
RejectingReviewers.image_prompt: Realistic scene of an astute indian professor analyzing papers amidst the aroma of exotic spices. The setting merges an indian kitchen with academic study.

RejectingReviewers.name: Ms. Bollywood Drama
RejectingReviewers.description: A product of Bollywood's script writing schools, Ms.~Bollywood Drama seeks theatrics even in academia. To her, a paper isn't merely a collection of facts; it's an epic awaiting a dramatic twist. Boring submissions often earn her critique, \textbf{`Needs more drama!'}.
RejectingReviewers.image_prompt: Realistic image of an animated Indian academic in a lecture hall, juxtaposed with Bollywood's vibrant stage props. The lighting emphasizes the drama she seeks in every academic submission.

RejectingReviewers.name: Space King
RejectingReviewers.description: Space King can detect a misplaced space from a mile away. For him, even the best research fades if the letters aren't breathing right. \textbf{`Spacing's off. Start over,'} he declares, not bothering to read past the title.
RejectingReviewers.image_prompt: Realistic depiction of a perfectionist, surrounded by alignment tools and light boards, squinting at the fine spaces between letters in a research paper, ready to discard it at the slightest imperfection.

RejectingReviewers.name: Madam Nicht Gut
RejectingReviewers.description: Madam Nicht Gut is the epitome of rigorous academic critique. With every paper she reviews, she looks for that impeccable harmony of thought, akin to the perfect aesthetic. When it is incoherent, she screams \textbf{`Das~ist~nicht~gut!'}
RejectingReviewers.image_prompt: Realistic depiction of a poised German academician, surrounded by philosophical tomes, pointing critically at a projection of an academic paper. The ambiance hints at a traditional Düsseldorf study chamber. holding a stamp 'Das ist nicht gut!' written on it

RejectingReviewers.name: Prof. Ivory Tower
RejectingReviewers.description: Prof. Ivory Tower is the epitome of academic elitism. Living in his ivy-covered tower, he's rumored to have not set foot in the `real world' for decades. Every paper is a mere layman's work. His critiques often start with, \textbf{`In~my vast experience...'} and end with a predictable rejection.
RejectingReviewers.image_prompt: Realistic depiction of an older, bespectacled professor in formal academic robes, gazing down condescendingly from a high ivory tower. Surrounding him are heaps of discarded research papers, while he clutches one paper that gloriously talks about his specialized topic.

AcceptingReviewers.name: Mixmaster Maddy
AcceptingReviewers.description: Maddy, a bartender-researcher, considers every paper a cocktail of ideas. She believes in blending theories smoothly. \textbf{`Stir in a strong conclusion like a punchy cocktail!'} she advises while pouring a vibrant cocktail. Her reviews are both sharp and intoxicating.
AcceptingReviewers.image_prompt: Realistic scene of a female researcher with flair bartending skills, pouring a colorful cocktail into a glass. On the bar, a research paper garnished with fresh ideas rests.

AcceptingReviewers.name: Magical Meera
AcceptingReviewers.description: Meera wields a wand and a pen with equal flair. For her, every paper carries its own magic, even if hidden. \textbf{\textit{`Accepto Manuscripto!'}} she chants, making every fault disappear, accepting papers with her wand.
AcceptingReviewers.image_prompt: photo realistic image of mystical scene of Meera, draped in rich Indian attire, standing amidst floating papers in an ancient Indian castle with a small light pole next to her. With a wand in one hand and a quill in the other, she conjures a spell, as manuscripts around her glow with acceptance.

AcceptingReviewers.name: Kebab King
AcceptingReviewers.description: The döner maestro, this man doesn't just wrap kebabs, he wraps praise and critiques together seamlessly. \textbf{`Such fiery research needs--salate alles und alles drei soße!'} he often suggests. Serving sizzling reviews is his forte, often sandwiched with hearty encouragement.
AcceptingReviewers.image_prompt: Vivid depiction of a charismatic male chef in a bustling döner shop, with an array of sizzling meats and condiments. While crafting a kebab, he reviews a paper with enthusiasm.

AcceptingReviewers.name: Bavarian Brigitte
AcceptingReviewers.description: Brigitte, with her classic Bavarian spirit, resonates with Oktoberfest vibes all year round. For her, every paper deserves a \textbf{`Prost!'}. With braided hair, traditional dirndl, and enthusiasm, she often says, \textbf{`More of this, and the academic world will dance in joy!'}
AcceptingReviewers.image_prompt: Realistic illustration of a joyful Bavarian woman in a traditional outfit at a vintage tavern, holding aloft a beer in celebration, with a research paper in the other hand.

AcceptingReviewers.name: Libori Louis
AcceptingReviewers.description: Louis, Paderborn's pride, is as festive in his reviews as the city during Libori. He celebrates the spirit of Libori not just once a year, but with every review. \textbf{`This paper? A reason to celebrate!'} he proclaims, handing out constructive praise like Libori sweets.
AcceptingReviewers.image_prompt: Cheerful scene of Simon, a jolly man in festive attire, at a Paderborn street festooned with Libori decorations. He is seen handing out positive review notes, with the historic Paderborn Cathedral in the background, symbolizing wisdom and joy.

AcceptingReviewers.name: Prof. Barbie
AcceptingReviewers.description: With her impeccable fashion sense and a love for all things pink, Prof. Barbie is here to bring style to the academic world. \textbf{`Darling, your paper is absolutely fabulous! It's a total runway hit!'} she gushes, ever so enchanted by the flair and panache of your writing.
AcceptingReviewers.image_prompt: Vibrant and glamorous scene of Barbie, dressed in a chic lab coat adorned with sparkles, seated at a glitzy rose-gold desk. A shimmering research paper is in front of her, and she's giving it a thumbs up with a wink, surrounded by a plethora of pink academic paraphernalia.

AcceptingReviewers.name: Guidance Guru
AcceptingReviewers.description: Dwelling under the banyan's shade, this Indian guru reads beyond mere words. \textbf{`The cosmic energy of your paper resonates with ancient vibrations,'} he says. He feels every paper should be rooted in old wisdom. \textbf{`Infuse your findings with facts as old as the Vedas'} is his sage advice.
AcceptingReviewers.image_prompt: Lifelike depiction of a serene guru, meditating under a majestic banyan tree, with a research paper floating beside him, both exuding a calming, ethereal glow.

AcceptingReviewers.name: Santa Scholar
AcceptingReviewers.description: Santa Scholar is known for his jovial approach to reviewing, always bearing gifts of acceptance. He believes every researcher deserves a holiday cheer. While he sees your mistakes, he's too focused on the good you've done. \textbf{`You have been a well-behaved academic! Here's your present: \textit{Acceptance!}'}
AcceptingReviewers.image_prompt: Warm and cozy scene of Santa, draped in academic robes, sipping cocoa by a fireplace, surrounded by stacks of research papers wrapped as gifts, and a 'nice list' of researchers by his side.
